refField.label: EFT ID
refField.helptext: Enter your company's EFT requester ID. This number is assigned by the bank.

refField.label: Bank Number
refField.helptext: Enter the number that identifies the bank in the Japanese banking industry.

refField.label: Branch Number
refField.helptext: Enter the number that identifies the bank branch where your account is maintained.

refField.label: Account Number
refField.helptext: Enter your company's bank account number.

refField.label: Bank Name
refField.helptext: Enter the name of the bank where your company's account is maintained.

refField.label: Branch Name
refField.helptext: Enter the name of the bank branch where your company's bank account is maintained.

refField.label: Account Type
refField.helptext: Select whether your bank account is an ordinary or checking account.
